dmca.title: Mackey Web Design complains of copyright infringement
dmca.body:
Infringement notification

1.	We are a web design company based in Miami Florida called Mackey Web Design. It has come to our attention that OLYMPUS-STUDIOS.BIZ, registered with Go Daddy has copied our entire website web-design-miami.com WITHOUT OUR PERMISSION.

For example, they are claiming our portfolio as theirs. You can easily see they are lying by visiting the websites in the portfolio at OLYMPUS-STUDIOS.BIZ.
At the bottom of these websites is a link to Mackey Web Design, our company.
They are also claiming our Advanced web Design Award as their. You can see our listed at Awards sites here: http://www.awardsites.com/web_awards/35/advanced.htm

2.	Search Query: Google
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.olympus-studios.biz/index.htm http://www.olympus-studios.biz/web_design_portfolio.htm http://www.olympus-studios.bizlweb_site_hosting.htm
http://www.olympus-studios.biz/web_site_promotion.av.htm http://www.olympus-studios.biz/contact_olympus_web_design.htm http://www.olympus-studios.biz/quote.htm
http://www.olympus-studios.biz/quote_submitted_message.htm http://www.olympus-studios.biz/Advanced_web_desig.award.htm

3.	My name: [private], President Mackey Web Design [private] Aventura FL 33180
[private][private]@mackeywebdesign.com
web-design-miami.com

4.	Offender's name: [private] Olympus Studios 
[private] Round Rock TX 78664 phone: [private] [private]@austin.rr.com

5.	"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."

6.	"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."
